attributes.action: Help us English women with abusive immigrants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I'm an English women who at the age of 15 was raped by my ex partner, I was beaten within an inch of my life for over 7 years and repeatedly raped. 

I spoke to the home office as he is an illegal albanian immigrant who works cash in hand pay no tax or NI gets a free place to live, deals in drugs and guns and abuses our system and the home office told me there was nothing they could do.

It makes me sick to be treated like a second class citizen in my own country.

someone has to help us.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
